Reviews.Title: Great computer
Reviews.Author: berrysa
Reviews.Content: I bought this refurbished about a month ago, and it's a great computer for the money.  The external side of the lid was scratched a bit, but the inside of the laptop looked like it had never been used.  So far I'm not a big fan of the Windows 8 operating system, but I have no complaints about the computer itself.

Reviews.Title: replacement
Reviews.Author: mike
Reviews.Content: as my title says i bought it to replace my old 5 year old Toshiba that died recently, i wasn't looking for anyone hardcore just something that can stream movies, i have actually installed a game or two on it and they run but at lowered settings and a bit laggy the os is ok i wouldn't have it on my main computer tho.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Jer "Jer"
Reviews.Content: Great condition and worked out of the box with full charge. Ocean Reef Electronics delivered what they have promised and very quickly. The 2 computers we purchased are for my nephews to use (as required) at their school.  These computer will deliver what is needed for Middle school students to work online and with individual software programs as required by the programs they are in.

Reviews.Title: Unable to connect to internate and stay connected. I hate the experience
Reviews.Author: Enoabasi Iyoho
Reviews.Content: this computer is unable to connect to interet and stay connected the experience is worst I have ever had in my life. It slow and was not good for the purpose I bought it for
